channel.title: Smart Home Circle
channel.description: A comprehensive resource covering Smart Home Tech, detailed Single Board Computers (SBC) reviews, mini PC, Home Automation, HomeLab upgrades, and Home Assistant guides.

item.title: Radxa Dragon Q6A: my hands-on experience (benchmarks, thermals, and Windows 11 Pro on ARM)
item.description: My Radxa Dragon Q6A review with benchmark results, thermals, NVMe/UFS speeds, Home Assistant voice tests, and a walkthrough of Windows 11 on ARM (UEFI).
item.author: contactsmarthomecircle@gmail.com (Amrut Prabhu)

item.title: Muse Pi Pro (Spacemit K1 / M1) – My First Real RISC-V Experience
item.description: Hands-on review of the Muse Pi Pro RISC-V SBC with the SpacemiT K1 SoC – benchmarks, thermals, NVMe and Wi-Fi 6 performance, plus my honest thoughts for developers.
item.author: contactsmarthomecircle@gmail.com (Amrut Prabhu)

item.title: Radxa Cubie A7A Review: Pi-Sized Power With PCIe, NVMe, USB 3.1 Gen2, Thermals & Real-World Benchmarks
item.description: I benchmarked the Radxa Cubie A7A (Allwinner A733): thermals, Geekbench, LPDDR5, PCIe NVMe, USB 3.1 Gen2, Whisper/HA, and Pi 5 vs Pi 4 comparisons.
item.author: contactsmarthomecircle@gmail.com (Amrut Prabhu)

item.title: Running an AMD Instinct MI50 on a LattePanda Mu Lite (OCuLink eGPU) for Local LLMs
item.description: Step-by-step AMD Instinct MI50 eGPU on LattePanda Mu Lite carrier board: Ubuntu 24.04 HWE, ROCm, Vulkan, Ollama & llama.cpp on GPU, PCIe/OCuLink
item.author: contactsmarthomecircle@gmail.com (Amrut Prabhu)

item.title: Radxa Cubie A5E Hands-On: The Budget NVMe SBC—Full Review & Results
item.description: Radxa Cubie A5E tested—performance, temps, NVMe speeds, and value vs Raspberry Pi, with real numbers and use-cases
item.author: contactsmarthomecircle@gmail.com (Amrut Prabhu)

item.title: Radxa X4L: A Pocket-Sized Powerhouse
item.description: A powerful pocket-sized PC featuring the Intel N100 processor, dual 32-bit LPDDR5 memory channels, and versatile OS support. Ideal for home automation, virtualization, and portable computing.
item.author: contactsmarthomecircle@gmail.com (Amrut Prabhu)

item.title: Raspberry Pi Compute Module 5: Performance, Testing, and Potential
item.description: Unleash Raspberry Pi Compute Module 5: compact, versatile mini-computer for high-speed storage, DIY NAS, and innovative projects.
item.author: contactsmarthomecircle@gmail.com (Amrut Prabhu)

item.title: How to Install OS on Raspberry Pi Compute Module 5 with eMMC Storage
item.description: Step by step guide to install Raspberry Pi OS on Raspberry Pi Compute Module 5 with eMMC Storage
item.author: contactsmarthomecircle@gmail.com (Amrut Prabhu)

item.title: Radxa X4: 60$ Powerful Atlernative to Raspberry Pi 5
item.description: Radxa X4, A New Intel-Based Single Board Computer: Features, Performance, and Use Cases
item.author: contactsmarthomecircle@gmail.com (Amrut Prabhu)

item.title: Exploring the Orange Pi 5 MAX: A Powerful Successor to the Orange Pi 5 Pro
item.description: In this article we will look at the Orange Pi 5 MAX and compare it with the Raspberry Pi 5 in terms of performance
item.author: contactsmarthomecircle@gmail.com (Amrut Prabhu)
